headings.heading: General
points: Indian stock indices surge to record levels as investor confidence grows following positive economic indicators and policy reforms.

headings.heading: Top Headlines
points: The Indian economy demonstrated robust growth with GDP expanding by 7.2% in the fourth quarter, driven by strong manufacturing and services sectors.
Leading technology companies pledge $2 billion investment in Indian artificial intelligence and machine learning startups, boosting the tech ecosystem.
Team India secures a commanding victory against Australia, booking their place in the Cricket World Cup semi-finals with an impressive performance.
India achieves a historic milestone as solar energy prices drop to unprecedented levels, making clean energy more accessible across the nation.
The Indian film industry marks a century of entertainment with special screenings and celebrations across major cities
Government unveils comprehensive healthcare program aimed at providing quality medical services to rural communities across India.
